function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited inclusion of mental health and communicable disease outcomes","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of overall health impact, potential neglect of important health factors","Mitigation":"Include mental health and communicable disease outcomes in the review to ensure a comprehensive assessment of health impacts","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research teams, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of subgroup analysis by SES level in relation to greenspace exposure and health outcomes","Impact":"Inability to identify potential health inequalities and disparities in greenspace benefits","Mitigation":"Conduct formal subgroup analysis by SES level to understand the relationship between greenspace exposure and health outcomes for different socio-economic groups","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools","People":"Health professionals, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research teams, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Missing criteria in quality appraisal of studies, specifically related to greenspace measurement and analysis","Impact":"Reduced reliability and validity of study findings, potential bias in assessment of greenspace impact on health","Mitigation":"Ensure inclusion of criteria for greenspace measurement and analysis in quality appraisal to improve study quality","Technologies":"Quality appraisal tools, data analysis software","People":"Researchers, quality assessment teams","Owner":"Research teams, academic institutions"}]}
